name: Zacharias
description:
Zacharias, an earnest farmer, sets out  for Mount Olympus with two faithful friends in attempt to cure his dying father.

This is a complete  game containing

  • One hour of charming, story-driven game play.
  • A 16bit JRPG spin on the mythological Greek universe.
  • Lovable heroes.
  • A traditional turn-based JRPG battle system.

This game is an Rpg Maker 2003 game, created in one month for the  "No Plugin November" RPG Maker Jam.
